Text: RE PLEASE READ Cc Here at Enron Global EP I have polled my CEO Jeff Sherrick and my CFOCA O Howard Selzer and neither they nor I have anything to report Am I supposed to poll everyone in the business unit people in Houston and overseas Stephen Original Message From Enron NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESEnronAnnouncementsCorpEnron NRONcom On Behalf Of Mark Taylor Vice President and General CounselENRON Sent Tuesday June PM To NYMEX Hedge Exemption NRON Subject PLEASE READ To Department ENA Legal From Mark Taylor Date May Vice President and General Counsel Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications We are in the process of preparing applications for position limit exemptio ns for ENAs NYMEX energy commodities futures trading These applications require that ENA represent whether its officers employees owners or agen ts have a power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any relat ed commodity futures account either individually or acting with another pers on pursuant to express or implied agreement Please direct any responses to my paralegal Tana Jones via intercompany email or call her at by the end of business on June if you have any power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any commodity futures account other than an ENA or other trading affiliate account IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A COMMODITY FUTURES ACCOUNT YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESPOND TO THIS REQUEST

RE PLEASE READWallace Vice President and Assistant General Counsel Enron Global Exploration Production Inc Houston with projects in India and China Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Wednesday June PM To Wallace Stephen Subject RE PLEASE READ What company are you with Stephen nronXgate PM To Mark Tay lor Vice President and General CounselENRON IMCEANOTESMarkTaylorVicePresidentandGeneralCounsel NRONcom nronXgate cc Tana CT Subject RE PLEASE READ Mark Here at Enron Global EP I have polled my CEO Jeff Sherrick and my CFOCA O Howard Selzer and neither they nor I have anything to report Am I supposed to poll everyone in the business unit people in Houston and overseas Stephen Original Message From Enron NRON mailtoIMCEANOTESEnronAnnouncementsCorpEnron NRONcom On Behalf Of Mark Taylor Vice President and General CounselENRON Sent Tuesday June PM To NYMEX Hedge Exemption NRON Subject PLEASE READ To Department ENA Legal From Mark Taylor Date May Vice President and General Counsel Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications We are in the process of preparing applications for position limit exemptio ns for ENAs NYMEX energy commodities futures trading These applications require that ENA represent whether its officers employees owners or agen ts have a power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any relat ed commodity futures account either individually or acting with another pers on pursuant to express or implied agreement Please direct any responses to my paralegal Tana Jones via intercompany email or call her at by the end of business on June if you have any power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any commodity futures account other than an ENA or other trading affiliate account IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A COMMODITY FUTURES ACCOUNT YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESPOND TO THIS REQUEST
